Body:
image_pre_cti = np.zeros((5, 5))
image_pre_cti[:, (2)] = +100
im = cti_image.ImageFrame(frame_geometry=ci_frame.FrameGeometry.
    euclid_bottom_right(), array=image_pre_cti)
image_post_cti = im.add_cti_to_image(cti_params=params_serial, cti_settings
    =arctic_serial)
image_difference = image_post_cti - image_pre_cti
assert (image_difference[:, 0:2] > 0.0).all()
assert (image_difference[:, (2)] < 0.0).all()
assert (image_difference[:, 3:5] == 0.0).all()
